sn55.37:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
sn55.37:1.2: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.37:2.2: “Yato kho, mahānāma, buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti—
sn55.37:3.2: “Yato kho, mahānāma, upāsako pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti—
sn55.37:3.3: ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako sīlasampanno hotī”ti.
sn55.37:4.2: “Idha, mahānāma, upāsako saddho hoti, saddahati tathāgatassa bodhiṃ—
sn55.37:4.3: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.37:4.4: Ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako saddhāsampanno hotī”ti.
sn55.37:5.2: “Idha, mahānāma, upāsako vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato—
sn55.37:5.3: ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako cāgasampanno hotī”ti.
sn55.37:6.2: “Idha, mahānāma, upāsako paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā—
sn55.37:6.3: ettāvatā kho, mahānāma, upāsako paññāsampanno hotī”ti.
